info.title: POS System Backend API
info.description: API documentation for the Point of Sale system, including Authentication and Protected Resources.

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns an API token and user details.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all active categories (excludes soft deleted categories). Supports sorting and pagination.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Field to sort by (id, name, created_at, updated_at)

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items per page (1-100). Omit for no pagination.

meta.description: Pagination metadata (only present when per_page is specified)

get.summary: Search suppliers by name, email, phone, or company

parameters.name: search_term
parameters.description: The term to search for across name, email, phone, and company fields.

404.description: No suppliers found matching the search criteria.

get.summary: Retrieve a specific supplier by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the supplier to retrieve

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the supplier to update

delete.description: Soft delete a category by ID. The category is marked as deleted but not physically removed from the database. Requires authentication and categories.manage permission.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the supplier to delete

post.description: Restore a category that was previously soft deleted. Requires authentication and categories.manage permission.

message.example: You do not have the required permission.

404.description: Category not found or not deleted

message.example: Category not found or not deleted

parameters.description: Search term to filter categories (case-insensitive partial match on name and description)
